content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” wpex_bg_overlay=”color” css=”.vc_custom_1629273750215{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/banner-process-1.jpg?id=9982) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” wpex_bg_overlay_color=”#ffffff” wpex_bg_overlay_opacity=”0.65″ visibility=”hidden-desktop”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md” css=”.vc_custom_1629273755491{margin-top: 40px !important;background-color: rgba(216,216,216,0.9) !important;*background-color: rgb(216,216,216) !important;}”][vc_column_text font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#404040″]

Residential and Commercial Painters and Decorators in London

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]
GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1628690902927{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/banner-process.jpg?id=9163) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” visibility=”hidden-phone”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs” css=”.vc_custom_1628690890716{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 500px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Banner-Residental2.jpg?id=9746) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_row_inner el_class=”.pag84-container”][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1628690879641{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 80px !important;background-image: url(https://thegoodpainter.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2021/08/Banner-Residental2.jpg?id=9746) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column_text font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#ffffff”]

Residential and Commercial Painters and Decorators in London

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

Our Process explained in complete detail for your security of mind and understanding on how The Good Painter’s experienced team completes a high-quality and exceptional service to your Residential and Commercial Project in London.

[vc_empty_space height=”20px”]
GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1627294987137{margin-left: -30px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1627295161855{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9172″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1553016910268{padding-left: 40px !important;}”]

Initial Consultation

[vc_column_text color=”#404040″]Our first course of action is to establish and understand what your painting and decorating requirements entail. Our experienced team has the knowledge and a thorough understanding of the market; therefore, we will be able to discuss the best suitable materials and colour within your budget and specification. In our consultation, we will be able to conclude:[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text color=”#404040″ css=”.vc_custom_1627295811353{padding-top: 20px !important;}”]
  • Any questions regarding your residential or commercial painting project
  • Advise on paint colours, finishes and each purpose
  • A thorough plan of the works schedule and process
  • Any time requirements and a fixed budget
  • Your final view and vision of your painting and decorating project
  • Additional questions which you are unclear about
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_single_image image=”9183″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1627295915846{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1565764254121{margin-right: 40px !important;margin-left: 20px !important;}”]

Planning and Organising

[vc_column_text color=”#404040″]Once communication is established, it’s time to create a plan of action and commence planning. We know how important it is to get this stage correct, as we avoid any future disruptions and inconveniences before works. Ensuring a smooth and hassle-free journey to painting and decorating the residential or commercial project of your dreams. When planning, we will:[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text color=”#404040″ css=”.vc_custom_1627295818093{padding-top: 20px !important;}”]
  • Prepare detailed plans and documentation for the works needed and discussed
  • Establish a timeline that works for you and around your hours
  • Organise our team of expert painters and decorators for your specified project
  • Purchase the best quality products, materials, tools and protection for your rest of mind
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”9183″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1565866009782{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9177″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1553016937102{padding-left: 40px !important;}”]

Preparation and Painting

[vc_column_text color=”#404040″]Our experienced team is all prepared and ready to commence your residential or commercial project with a comprehensive plan of action and schedule. We understand that not everyone is available to be on-site consistently, hence why we can arrange an agreement in obtaining keys from a safe nearby location or neighbour.

Every surface and furniture are protected with maximum care while painting and decorating. Using only quality paints and tools to carry your work, we will ensure a long-lasting, high-quality finish for your site.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md”][vc_single_image image=”9178″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1565865920403{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1565764254121{margin-right: 40px !important;margin-left: 20px !important;}”]

Cleaning

[vc_column_text color=”#404040″]Our job isn’t complete once we finish works, we want you to experience the full renovation and showcase the space in its prime setting. Our professional team will ensure your space is meticulous with paint being dried and wallpaper professionally finished. We will remove any unnecessary waste materials and thoroughly clean your residential or commercial space, ready to be accessible and displayed.

We pride ourselves on the care, attention and passion we inject to every project, that is why it is also fulfilling to us when we spotlessly present your space. If not available for collection of keys, we will organise and establish a convenient location nearby to drop your keys.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_single_image image=”9178″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1565866009782{padding-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9186″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1553016937102{padding-left: 40px !important;}”]

Handover

[vc_column_text color=”#404040″]Every project is followed up with a detailed review, ensuring you have the fundamental equipment and knowledge in taking care of and maintaining your surfaces in the long term. Allowing you to maintain a pristine appearance of your residential and commercial space, we will provide a “Finishes Schedule” for your future reference and understanding of what colours were used for your space.

You will be fully equipped and prepared for any future matters with the schedules and reviews which The Good Painter has given to you, as we believe in a full, complete and high-quality service for our clients.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1627296521279{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;background-color: #442e3a !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text text_align=”center” font_family=”Playfair Display” color=”#ffffff”]

Get your London residential or commercial space transformed by our superb painters and decorators

[/vc_column_text]
GET AN ONLINE QUOTE NOW
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1567527415293{margin-left: 5px !important;padding-top: 10px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text color=”#404040″ css=”.vc_custom_1627298323356{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}” text_align=”center” font_family=”Playfair Display” font_size=”25″]

Painting and decorating Residential projects we have delivered in London

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

Before and After: A chic and stylish painting and decorating makeover for a busy London businesswoman

When Ana first came to us, she had just become the owner of a two-bedroom…

Success story: Painting and decorating a four-storey family house in Chelsea, London

Yasmina and Labib moved into a five-bedroom house in Chelsea, London a number of years…

Before and After: First Home, First Painting and Decorating Experience for Young Couple

Buying a first property is always exciting but can be challenging - especially for a…

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1627296441447{margin-top: 20px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;background-color: #442e3a !important;}”][vc_column]

What our customers think

Great team and excellent job! The Good Painter was recommended by a friend of mine, also a professional landlord. The team didn’t disappoint, great service and excellent quality job! I will use the Good Painter the next time I need painting and decorating in London!

AlexSee Case Study
Rating: 5

My wife and I are more than pleased with the final result, and can’t wait to invite friends and family over to our new looking home. We are quite certain to have dealings with your firm in future projects. I would 100% recommend you to my friends, family and colleagues.

JonathanSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you The Good painter! We are extremely happy with the results! We couldn’t ask for a friendlier, more hardworking and dedicated team of professionals! Would happily recommend The Good Painter to friends and family!

 

YasminaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you! We love our new flat, it looks absolutely stunning! We are so happy to have chosen The Good Painter, a fantastic team of hard working guys! Very professional, flexible and friendly service throughout. The good Painter are indeed good painters, excellent painters!

PavelSee case study
Rating: 5

Punctual, friendly and very professional! I have used the services of The Good Painter before and would gladly use them again! The job was completed on time and at a very high quality, the price was excellent, the customer service-very competent and friendly. A pleasure to work with!

AnaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Thank you, The Good Painter! We really appreciate you finishing the job despite the tight time frame and budget!  A team of professionals, decoration at the highest level! We couldn’t be happier with the results.

MonicaSee Case Study
Rating: 5

I recently became a house owner for the first time and needed quality painting and decorating services at a good price. The Good Painter provided both, plus excellent decoration and colour consultancy advice on the top. Stress-free service, very helpful and friendly customer service! I definitely recommend! Thank you!

ZoeSee Case Study
Rating: 5

Easy to work with, friendly, professional and really efficient. What more could you ask for! My flat has never looked better! The decorators did an excellent job!

Bill
Rating: 5
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Contact us

0207 760 7672

Whats App us

0796 135 6442

Office Open

Mon-Fri 8am-6pm

Email us

info@thegoodpainter.co.uk

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
